output_list.impact: Integer overflow in mintTokens function allows the owner to set the balance of an arbitrary user to any value.
The freezeTransfersUntil function allows the owner to restrict the functions of any user, but the owner's permissions are arbitrarily set.
Integer overflow in burnTokens function allows the owner to set the balance of a user to zero.
The isRestrictedAddress function allows the owner to restrict the functions of any user, but the owner's permissions are arbitrarily set.
The setOwner function allows the owner to set the owner of the contract, but the owner's permissions are arbitrarily set.
The setICO function allows the owner to set the ICO address, but the owner's permissions are arbitrarily set.
The setTokenFrozenUntil function allows the owner to set the token frozen until block, but the owner's permissions are arbitrarily set.
Integer overflow in burn function allows the owner to burn tokens from any user.
Integer overflow in burnFrom function allows the owner to burn tokens from any user.
The transfer function allows the owner to transfer tokens from any user, but the owner's permissions are arbitrarily set.
The transferFrom function allows the owner to transfer tokens from any user, but the owner's permissions are arbitrarily set.
The approve function allows the owner to approve any user to spend tokens on behalf of the owner, but the owner's permissions are arbitrarily set.
The approveAndCall function allows the owner to approve any user to spend tokens on behalf of the owner, but the owner's permissions are arbitrarily set.
